title: Augmenting Radiological Diagnostics with AI for Tuberculosis and COVID-19 Disease Detection: Deep Learning Detection of Chest Radiographs
details: M Kolhar, AM Al Rajeh, RNA Kazi - Diagnostics, 2024
abstract: In this research, we introduce a network that can identify pneumonia, COVID-19, and tuberculosis using X-ray images of patients' chests. The study emphasizes tuberculosis, COVID-19, and healthy lung conditions, discussing how advanced …

title: Slice-Consistent Lymph Nodes Detection Transformer in CT Scans via Cross-slice Query Contrastive Learning
details: Q Yu, Y Wang, K Yan, L Lu, N Shen, X Ye, X Ding…
abstract: Lymph node (LN) assessment is an indispensable yet very challenging task in the daily clinical workload of radiology and oncology offering valuable insights for cancer staging and treatment planning. Finding scatteredly distributed, low-contrast clinically …
